inventory=[{"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft polished_andesite, I need to craft 4 andesite first. To craft andesite, I need to move 1 cobblestone from slot 26 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1
